attributes.action: Reduce to a bare minimum the 'Human Rights' enjoyed by convicted criminals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given that the government is impotent to scrap Human Rights act because of european legislation they should reduce the Human Rights of convicted criminals and terrorists. The fact that these people enjoy the same rights as decent law abiding citizens, even when in prison is plainly wrong.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
